title: Shiva - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Child Abuse   Cold Love Interests   Death of Loved Ones   Delusions   Family Conflict   Inferiority Complex   Modern Day   Short Story   Time Loop   Unreliable Narrator
author: 夜行灯花宵
description:
My boyfriend and I had an appointment to go see Shiva, but he did not show up on the day of our departure.

He never missed an appointment.>
